issue.title: [C++] Use unique_ptr with array builder classes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1172](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1172). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While this is an API break from 0.4.x, there isn't as much reason to use shared pointers with builder classes since object ownership will not be nearly so diverse.
